title: Murder by Plum Pudding
description:
Murder Ã  la mode! There's nothing more fun than a festive holiday dinner party and Ginger Reed, the former Lady Gold, has Hartigan House decorated and the gramophone playing. Dressed in her finest Parisian low-waisted gown, feather-topped tiara, and T-strapped Italian leather shoes, Ginger is ready to host the delectable event.It's a jolly good time, until someone chokes on the pudding.Is it an accident or is it murder? And can Ginger unravel the mystery before the church bells ring and New Year's Day dawns?
Previously published as part of the boxed set titled Six Merry Little Murders.
 ~  Clean read: no graphic violence, sex, or strong language.  Genre: dog cozy mystery series / historical mystery / women amateur sleuth / British detective mystery  
  
  Hop aboard the 1920s!
author: Lee Strauss
